data.caption: Clarification On Price Movement
data.news_body: Clarification on Price Movement

data.caption: Clarification sought from Texmaco Infrastructure & Holdings Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Texmaco Infrastructure & Holdings Ltd on February 27 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
